name: Your Sound
description:
Informational (modular) poem by Arian Bagheri Pour Fallah.

Part of the Teilkunstwerk ‘Man in the Sound of God (Mensch im Klang Gottes)’ by Arian Bagheri Pour Fallah.

Details: RecitMusic.art/Mensch

Site-specific art @ Stiftung Künstlerdorf Schöppingen.
Premiere: July 19, 2021

Dimensions (in pixels): 10200 x 24000
